1123212.title: Johnanthan's next class begins walking in

Anthony flipped a switch beside the whiteboard and an image of the latest essay prompts flashed onto the wall from the ceiling projector. Anthony glanced over to his desk but didn't see any movement.

"Hey, um...you're in the way?"
